title: Enhancing Capacitive Deionization for Water Desalination: The Role of Activated Carbon in Contaminant Removal
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00026A, Critical Review
xuan wang, Shuya Shan, Yaoli Zhang, Sheldon Q. Shi, Changlei Xia
The desalination of saline water is of great importance in water-stressed areas. The energy efficiency and secondary contaminants of emerging desalination technologies need to be addressed. The heavy metal ions...
